title: Dead Band Filter Function Block
description: This function block implements a dead band filter that processes an input signal to filter out noise and stabilize it. It computes the filtered output by determining a dead band around the input signal X based on given time parameters and constants.
name: DEAD_BAND_A

input.name: X
input.description: The input signal to be filtered.

input.name: T
input.description: The time constant for the filtering process.

input.name: KL
input.description: A scaling factor for the dead band, default value is 1.0.

input.name: LM
input.description: The maximum limit for the dead band's width.

output.name: Y
output.description: The processed output signal after applying dead band filtering.

output.name: L
output.description: The computed width of the dead band, representing stability.
